ch0118_00_lillie/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Where are you headed today?
ch0118_00_lillie/0101_0701_02_10:
You can have an adventure anytime, anywhere
when you’re with Pokémon!
ch0118_00_lillie/0601_0701_01_10:
There’s so much nature to be found in the forests
of Pasio.
ch0118_00_lillie/0601_0701_02_10:
But there aren’t any wild Pokémon here since this
is an artificial island.
ch0118_00_lillie/0601_0701_03_10:
There are still Trainers who come out of nowhere
to challenge you to battles, though, so you can’t
let your guard down!
ch0118_00_lillie/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m always prepared to go on an adventure at a
moment’s notice!
ch0118_00_lillie/0602_0701_02_10:
I have items for taking care of the Pokémon I meet
and a diary for recording my adventures.
ch0118_00_lillie/0602_0701_03_10: I even have some snacks just in case I get hungry!
ch0118_00_lillie/0602_0701_05_10:
I bring a positive attitude to enjoy the adventure
ahead! Can’t forget that, can I?
ch0118_00_lillie/0603_0701_01_10:
When I wear makeup, I feel as if it lets me
become a slightly different version of myself.
ch0118_00_lillie/0603_0701_02_10:
It’s like a breath of fresh air that lets me refocus
and get back to work!
ch0118_00_lillie/0604_0701_01_10: The key to Pokémon Evolution is mutual trust.
ch0118_00_lillie/0604_0701_02_10:
That’s why I was always with my Pokémon—even
when I was sleeping or reading.
ch0118_00_lillie/0604_0701_03_10: Before I knew it, she just evolved all on her own!
ch0118_00_lillie/0604_0701_04_10:
But mutual trust isn’t something you can see,
so there’s no use in trying to rush it.
ch0118_00_lillie/0605_0701_01_10:
I’ve been thinking about what I can do for my
partner Pokémon as her Trainer.
ch0118_00_lillie/0605_0701_02_10:
Of course, I want to train her well so she
gets stronger...
ch0118_00_lillie/0605_0701_03_10:
but I feel like what’s most important is to always
tell her just how much she means to me!
ch0118_00_lillie/0605_0701_04_10:
Even if she can’t understand what I’m saying, I’m
sure she understands how I feel!
ch0118_00_lillie/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! You’ve come at a good time!
ch0118_00_lillie/1701_0701_02_10:
I have something to give you! It’s a really
nice item.
ch0118_00_lillie/1701_0702_01_10:
You’ll want to use a lot of these! Ah...I don’t have
a lot to give you, though.
ch0118_00_lillie/2501_0701_01_10: I used to cuddle a Poké Doll while I slept.
ch0118_00_lillie/2501_0701_02_10:
My doll was one of my most treasured possessions
when I was in Alola.
ch0118_00_lillie/2501_0701_03_10: But now I cuddle my partner Pokémon.
ch0118_00_lillie/2501_0702_01_10: I still don’t really like sleeping alone.
ch0118_00_lillie/2501_0702_02_10:
I can’t help but worry that Pokémon who hide in
dark spaces will pop out to scare me.
ch0118_00_lillie/2511_0701_01_10:
I think keeping a diary and writing in it every day
is a good way to track daily changes.
ch0118_00_lillie/2511_0701_02_10:
I write down what happened on a given day and
how it made me feel.
ch0118_00_lillie/2511_0701_03_10:
Reading over my old diary entries reminds me that
I’m making progress. I really recommend it!
ch0118_00_lillie/2511_0702_01_10:
I keep my diary locked up tight so no one else can
read it.
ch0118_00_lillie/2511_0702_02_10:
You look like you want to take a peek, but there’s
no way I’m letting you!
ch0118_00_lillie/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Starting the day off with a warm
smile and a greeting always puts me in a
great mood!
ch0118_00_lillie/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s so calm and quiet today. It can be nice to just
sit back and relax sometimes.
ch0118_00_lillie/3005_0701_01_10:
I love to take naps and sleep...
And when I sleep, I reeeally sleep.
